body_content.explanation: the changes in the body's physiology (= the way that it works and the physical processes that happen inside it) at different times of the day and night, or the study of this:
examples: Sleep disturbances may involve disrupted chronobiology, characterized by excessive daytime napping.
As a pioneer in the field of chronobiology, he was able to accurately explain the cause of jet lag and how human bodies can adjust.
